text: Can you help me change my account password?
Sure, I can help with that. Can you confirm your username and old password for authentication?
My username is user1 and my old password is user1pass.
Alright. To change your password, I need a token for authentication. Let me retrieve it for you.
Got it. What would you like your new password to be?
Your password has been successfully changed. Anything else I can help you with?
No, that's all for now. Thank you!
You're welcome. Don't hesitate to ask if you need anything else.
